message: Let's start fair. I'll take 60, you take 40. We can work out a better deal later if we need to.
Let's be reasonable, Alice. This split accounts for the decreasing value of the money.  We can avoid further losses if you accept.
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but I think we can both do better. I'm willing to take a bit less, but I need a larger share. Let's find a middle ground that benefits us both.
Alice, this back and forth is pointless. We both lose with every round. I propose a fair 50/50 split so we can both walk away with something substantial.
